Posts.Title: Brain and lung mets what to expect DaughterofHER2 cheery

Posts.Content: Aug 20, 2012 06:34AM marieibrahim wrote: dear daughter i dont know if the radiologist is going to give your mother the whole radiation dose divided on five days (a really high dose fraction per day) or he is going  to give her a lower total dose with the same daily radiation fraction, the lower radiation dose per day the less toxic (30 gray given on more days with no difference in efficacy ). as  herceptin has caused heart problems ,i think she may not be able to take tykerb too. there are some indications that xeloda cross the BBB AND MAY BE EFFECTIVE IN BRAIN METS,AND COULD BE EFFECTIVE ALSO FOR HER LUNG METS EITHER ALONE OR COMBINED WITH OTHER CHEMO. TAKE CARE ,BEST WISHES

Posts.Content: Nov 5, 2010 07:00AM marieibrahim wrote: FISH test is the gold standard for her-2 .but if u say it is  a borderline result and IHC +3 THEN IT IS GENERALLY RECOMMENDED TO USE HERCEPTIN.IF U WANT U COULD REPEAT THE FISH TEST OR REPEAT THE THE IHC IN ANOTHER LARGE CENTER LAB.IF IT CAMES +3 again then it  s better to use herceptin good luck,hope that helped
